se.opendataexchange.ethernetip4j.segments
Class CipMessageRouterRequest

java.lang.Object
  se.opendataexchange.ethernetip4j.segments.CipMessageRouterRequest

public class CipMessageRouterRequest
extends java.lang.Object

Byte Name Type Description
0 Service USINT CipCommandServices
1 Request path size USINT Tag name length (+1 if odd)
2 - x EPATH Byte[] Tag name (special if structure)
(x+1) - y Request data Byte[] Depends on service

getSegmentLength

public static int getSegmentLength(int serviceId,
                                   java.lang.String tagName,
                                   java.lang.Object value,
                                   int writeCount)
                            throws NotImplementedException
Get length of CIP request segment.

Parameters:
serviceId -
tagName -
value - Value to write. Null in case of read requests.
writeCount - How many values to write. 0 in case of read requests.
Returns:
CIP message length (segment length).
